title: Minecraft Basics
description: Test your knowledge of the blocky world of Minecraft!

questions.question: What tool do you need to mine diamonds?
questions.explanation: You need at least an Iron Pickaxe to mine diamonds. Using anything weaker will destroy the diamond ore!

questions.question: You can sleep in a bed in the Nether.
questions.explanation: Beds explode when you try to use them in the Nether or the End! It's actually used as a combat strategy.

questions.question: How many blocks of obsidian do you need for a Nether Portal?
questions.explanation: A minimum Nether Portal requires 10 obsidian blocks (4x5 frame without corners), though 14 makes a complete frame!

questions.question: What do you feed wolves to tame them?
questions.explanation: Wolves are tamed by feeding them bones. Once tamed, they become loyal dogs that follow and protect you!

questions.question: Creepers are afraid of cats.
questions.explanation: Creepers will actively avoid cats and ocelots, making them useful for protecting your base!

questions.question: What is the rarest ore in the Overworld?
questions.explanation: Emerald ore is the rarest ore in the Overworld, only spawning in mountain biomes!

questions.question: What do you need to make a crafting table?
questions.explanation: A crafting table is made from 4 wooden planks arranged in a 2x2 square!

questions.question: Water flows further in the desert biome.
questions.explanation: Water flows the same distance (7 blocks) in all biomes. However, it evaporates instantly in the Nether!
